description: Unique identifier for the report definition record used by the application.
Human-readable title of the report template shown in menus, searches, and print options.
Short description summarizing the reportâ€™s purpose and/or version notes for administrators and users.
Functional category and subcategory used to organize reports and support filtering or security.
Extended notes or change log for the report, including status and update history.
Code indicating the reporting engine or format used to render the report (likely JasperReports; confirm with SME).
User or team responsible for maintaining and governing the report definition.
Stored access controls for the report (e.g., roles/users allowed to view, run, or edit; confirm with SME).
User account that created the report definition.
Timestamp when the report definition was created.
User account that last modified the report definition.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to the report definition.
Application resource key linking this record to the underlying report template or compiled artifact executed at runtime.
Raw JasperReports XML source of the report template stored as text.
Indicator that the report is system-provided rather than customer-defined (Y/N or similar).
Datetime when the report was last published or deployed for users.
User account that performed the most recent publish or deploy action.
